assertion: The textarea has an event listener for the 'keydown' event
The 'keydown' event listener for the textarea checks for the 'Tab' key press
The 'keydown' event listener for the textarea checks for the 'Enter' key press
The function 'handleSubmitCommand' is called when the 'Enter' key is pressed and the 'Shift' key is not pressed
There is a left arrow button with an 'onClick' event that moves to the previous suggestion and sets the focus back to the textarea
There is a right arrow button with an 'onClick' event that moves to the next suggestion and sets the focus back to the textarea
The textarea element should exist in the DOM
